a.title: A Video Message from the Superintendent - April 9

li.a: A Video Message from the Superintendent - April 9

div.p: All Butler Area School District students are able to order breakfast and lunch during our school closure.

p.a: Click here for more information and the order form>

div.p: Our schools created videos to say hello and send positive messages tostudents and families. Click to watch>
The Butler Board of School Directors wrote anopen letter to the staff, students, parents and community of the Butler Area School District.

This situation may significantly impact our families. If your family needs additional support during this time, there are organizations that can help, such as PA 2-1-1 Southwest and the Butler Center for Community Resources.

We have had many people reach out and offer to help support our students and families during this unprecedented time. We sincerely appreciate the offers. At this time, we do not currently need volunteers. However, that could change at any time.
We encourage everyone to think about how you are talking to your children about COVID-19.

p.a: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention>
